Torture Tower Doesn't Sleep: Nightmare Dream

拷(ごう)問(もん)塔(とう)は(は)眠(ねむ)らない(らない)　(　)ナイトメア(ナイトメア)　(　)ドリーム(ドリーム)goumontou wa nemuranai NAITOMEA DORIIMU

Torture Tower Doesn't Sleep: Nightmare Dream is a comedy manga adaptation of the Torture Tower Doesn't Sleep series by Sakiyo Kehki (崎(さき)由(よ)けぇき(けぇき)sakiyo keki). It began serialization in Dengeki Maoh on July 27, 2013.
